Name: Ferb
About the game: Ferb is a horror game. You are an explorer who ventures into a mysterious cave in search of a mythical gem and awaken a half robotic beast. Watch out for Ferb, who will do anything to get you out of his cave. Play with your friends or dive into the cave alone. Singleplayer Play through the game by yourself, uncovering secrets and solving puzzles while avoiding Ferb. Multiplayer Plug in a controller or even multiple and enter the cave with friends, avoiding Ferb. Note: Controller Required for Local Multiplayer
